description.narrative: Building a national movement for child rights across India to drive change for children underpinned communication, advocacy and partnerships work for 2019. CRC@30 was the flagship campaign - with Child Survival, Early Moments Matter and END Violence cause framework campaigns strengthening advocacy on WASH, Nutrition, Health and Child Protection objectives. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/01/2020
